text: Takeo Akuta in 1956 was a Japanese baseball player and manager who was a member of the Japanese Baseball League. He was a manager for six seasons for the Kintetsu Pearls of the Japan Pacific League. In 1988 he was elected to the Japanese Baseball Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Japanese baseball coaches Category:1903 births Category:1987 deaths
title: Takeo Akuta
